mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS m_id, a.ac_code AS ac_code, member_pw AS m_pw, member_level AS m_level, member_name AS m_name, member_gender AS m_gender, member_birth AS m_birth, member_phone AS m_phone, member_date AS m_date, stu_info_code FROM member AS a INNER JOIN Stu_PI AS b WHERE member_level='수강생' AND a.member_id = b.stu_id

SELECT stu_info_code, stu_id, member_name AS m_name, member_gender AS m_gender, stu_school, parents_phone, stu_brother, stu_info_etc FROM Stu_PI AS a INNER JOIN member AS b ON member_level = '수강생' AND a.stu_id = b.member_id WHERE stu_info_code = #{stuInfo}
mapper.update: UPDATE Stu_PI a INNER JOIN member b ON a.stu_id = b.member_id SET b.member_name=#{m_name}, b.member_gender=#{m_gender}, stu_school=#{stu_school}, parents_phone=#{parents_phone}, stu_brother=#{stu_brother}, stu_info_etc=#{stu_info_etc} WHERE stu_info_code=#{stu_info_code}
